SELECT art_title AS artTitle, art_title_img AS artTitleImg, art_createTime AS artCreateTime, art_click_count AS artClickCount, art_comment AS artComment, art_content AS artConent FROM sys_article
AND art_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{condition}, '%')
AND is_deleted = 1 AND art_status = "已发布"
ORDER BY art_createTime desc
